About Me

My name is Steven Matison and I am a Data Architect at DataStax. I began my journey at Datastax on 8/28/2020. I am currently working in the following technologies: cassandra, astra, stargate, graph, graphql, nosqlbench, java, maven, docker, ansible, kubernetes, spark, nifi, kafka.
